name: Turning Point
description:
Welcome to Turning Point, an educational strategy game featuring the history of New Zealand's most turbulent political time across the 70s and 80s. Experience the Muldoon leadership, the Springbok tour and the centralized economy in this initial release.

Feel free to contact me at either

oliver.gcoates@gmail.com or

Get out of here Stalker!#5860 on discord.
